author: cms-sw
body: DXR which needs py2-Pygments is only available for Python2. Python3 support seems unlikely ( https://github.com/mozilla/dxr/issues/704 ) . So for now, we add back py2-Pygments  and also patch dxr and Pygments  to treat our `.icc` files as `c++` files
title: build py2-Pygments which is needed by dxr; treat .icc as cpp files
